The goal of this web service is to provide REST access to the bionemo database

http://bionemo.bioinfo.cnio.es

=Examples=

==Genes==

*Get all genes*

http://ws.bioinfo.cnio.es/rest/bionemo/index.php?cmd=getAllGenes

*Get gene by Iname*

http://ws.bioinfo.cnio.es/rest/bionemo/index.php?cmd=getGeneByName&id=etbA1

==Operons==

*Get all operons*

http://ws.bioinfo.cnio.es/rest/bionemo/index.php?cmd=getAllOperons

*Get operon by name*

http://ws.bioinfo.cnio.es/rest/bionemo/index.php?cmd=getOperonByName&id=catABC
